ConstituentRole.name: ConstituentRole
ConstituentRole.description: Contains information about roles associated with the individual.

ContextRecordId.description: The record of the context that's associated with the constituent.

Description.description: The short description of the constituent's role in the system.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date from when the constituent role becomes inactive.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date from when the constituent role becomes active.

InstitutionId.description: The institution's account related to the constituent role.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

PersonId.description: The individual associated with the constituent role.

RoleType.description: Specifies the type of constituent role.

Status.description: The status of the constituent role.
